mapper.select: SELECT space_num, space_name, mainImagePath FROM seller_space WHERE users_num=#{users_num} ORDER BY space_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_space (space_num, space_name, users_num, oneliner, intro, mainImagePath, addr, addr2, cate_name) VALUES(seller_space_seq.NEXTVAL, #{space_name}, #{users_num}, #{oneliner}, #{intro}, #{mainImagePath}, #{addr}, #{addr2}, #{cate_name})
mapper.select: SELECT addr, space_name, mainImagePath, space_num FROM seller_space INNER JOIN space_category ON space_category.cate_name=seller_space.cate_name WHERE space_category.cate_num= #{cate_num}
SELECT COUNT(addr) FROM seller_space INNER JOIN space_category ON space_category.cate_name=seller_space.cate_name WHERE space_category.cate_num= #{cate_num}
